### Chart A

```{r}
data("ny_noaa")
ny_noaa <- ny_noaa %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  separate(date, into = c('year', 'month', 'day'), sep = "-") %>%
  mutate(
    tmax = as.numeric(tmax)/10,
    tmin = as.numeric(tmin)/10,
    prcp = prcp/10,
    year = as.numeric(year),
    month = as.numeric(month),
    day = as.numeric(day)
    ) %>% 
  filter(year %in% 2005:2010,
         month %in% c(12,1,2)) %>% 
  drop_na() %>% 
  sample_n(8000)
```
